          <title>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Datenträger-Rechner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calculatrice de Volume</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Converti il volume da un'unità a un'altra (es. da dl a cl).</string>
            <string language="en">Convert the volume from one unit to another (e.g. from dl to cl).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">volume</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">convertire</string>
            <string language="en">converter</string>
          </keyword>

          </structure>

Maßeinheit in andere um (z.B. von DL zu Cl).</string>
          </description>

          </description>

άλλη (π.χ. από το dl στο CL).</string>
